subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Martin O'Neill insisted that John Terry, the Chelsea captain, should have been sent off and that Aston Villa should have had a first-half penalty in the soccer game, which Chelsea won, 3-0.
snippet: Martin O'Neill insisted that John Terry, the Chelsea captain, should have been sent off and that Aston Villa should have had a first-half penalty in the soccer game, which Chelsea won, 3-0.
